capabilities.description: Castopod is able to chown files.
capabilities.name: CHOWN

capabilities.description: Castopod is able to bypass permission checks.
capabilities.name: DAC_OVERRIDE

capabilities.description: Castopod is able bypass permission checks for it's sub-processes.
capabilities.name: FOWNER

capabilities.description: Castopod is able to set group ID for it's sub-processes.
capabilities.name: SETGID

capabilities.description: Castopod is able to set user ID for it's sub-processes.
capabilities.name: SETUID

1.1.3.readme:
Castopod

Castopod is an open-source hosting platform made for podcasters who want engage and interact with their audience.
